input.sentences: i had a halloween party at my house .

output.sentences: We had a party at my house for halloween.
The construction worker could hardly stand upright from the weight of his tools.
The pirate and marnajar were funny.
The duo in the male/female costume looked uncomfortable.
The butterfly costume was pretty but her wings kept knocking into people.
